com.ibm.webest.persistence.service
Interface ProjectEnvironmentFacadeRemote

All Known Subinterfaces:
ProjectEnvironmentFacadeLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectEnvironmentFacade
public interface ProjectEnvironmentFacadeRemote

Facade for entity ProjectEnvironment.
Provides functionality to retrieve available values for the project environment parameters.

Author:
Gregor Schumm
